reviewText: It was OK it was a late night Cinamax movie you know low budget (probably spent about 0.12 cents making it). This is a guy flick but can only be watched in small doses unless you want to pull your hair out for the acting. Girls are hot and naked and that about covers the whole movie if not for that I would give this movie a 1

Yes, this is a softcore porn film the kind one sees( and has probally seen) on Cinemax, late night. In this case, don't expect too much of a review.
What plot exists has two babes battling for postions at a News Station called "WSEX" and they are portrayed by Anne Lynn Baxter and Debbie Rochon. There's lots of sex and a guy who tries to blow the station up with a bomb.
That's about it, really, but the main attraction for busty brunette fans is the MANY nude scenes of B-movie favorite, Debbie Rochon. She has a lengthy fully nude sex scene, a full frontal strip where she dresses in a hot, S and M outfit and gets undressed with some other babes and so forth. That's the main reason to see this not so classic, but if your not a skin fan than detract two stars from a mildly amusing, but otherwise unrewarding film. If you are a fan of such things, than purchase or rent this on the cheap for a swell time.

This gem of a film operates way above the head of your average T&A film fan; thus BB is truly miss-understood because it is more a spoof on late night Skini-max fare than it is a pandering offering to the masses. The writing is exceptional and the dialouge outstanding.

This movie was dumb;REALLY DUMB!The only part worth watching is the first five minutes where the brunette bombshell is riding that stupid news anchor guy...........other than that,it [was bad].If you're going to buy this movie,don't pay [too much] or you'll hate yourself.
